CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(Score__c<1 , "/img/samples/stars_000.gif", IF(Score__c<20, "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF(Score__c<40, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(Score__c<60, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(Score__c<80, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif" ))))), "Score Stars")
CustomField.label: Score Stars
